TopicTitle: Saved Games Do Not Load at Menu Screen

Articles.Content:
When 1.0 first came out I was unable to load any previous saved games. Clicking the Resume Saved button does nothing.

When starting a new game, everything works fine. If you put in the name of a previous save, it asks to overwrite the file, so it knows a save file is present somehow.

After playing a new game and then quitting/restarting KSP, the problem goes back to the same thing; the Resume Saved button does nothing.

Edited July 18, 2015 by Claw

Hi FoxHunt, this occurs when the affected save is missing files, usually the ships, VAB or SPH folders, please browse your KSP saves folder or your savegame, and if any of those folders are missing copy them over from another save.

Alternatively your persistent.sfs could be corrupt, and you will need to replace it with a copy of your last quicksave.

Thanks!

I was stumped there for a bit until I saw that I misspelled 'persistent'.
